text: National Inter College Ranikhet (also known as National School or NIC) is one of the oldest schools located in the centre of the city of Ranikhet. The school is for boys only. At present, the school holds a semi-government status and is run by the Ministry of Education of the government of Uttarakhand. National Inter College provides education from 6th grade to 12th grades in Hindi. The school is affiliated with the Uttarakhand Board of School Education ==History== National Inter College was founded in 1947 by the people of Ranikhet. Since its inception, National Inter College has produced bureaucrats, politicians, army officers, doctors, and engineers. Category:High schools and secondary schools in Uttarakhand
title: National Inter college, Ranikhet
